segments.description: The four opening matchups at Masters Bangkok have been decided.

segments.description: It’s the first trophy Vitality get to lift in the VCT.

segments.description: Team Liquid secures a grand final match against Vitality after eliminating the Seoul finalists.

segments.description: In-region showdowns and Kickoff rematches look to tell the Stage 1 story.

segments.description: See you in Thailand, SEN City.

segments.title: Team Liquid exacts revenge on FUT, Masters Bangkok in sight
segments.description: Team Liquid's lower bracket run continues, now sitting only one match away from Bangkok.

segments.title: Team Vitality secures Masters Bangkok slot, sweeps Heretics
segments.description: In a dominant showing, Team Vitality rolled over regional powerhouse Team Heretics in a 2-0 sweep.

segments.title: Gen.G strikes down TALON to reach Kickoff podium
segments.description: Gen.G's victory confirms Korea's domination over VCT Pacific, with only South Korean rosters remaining in the top three

segments.title: aspas carries MIBR across the line to eliminate KRÜ
segments.description: In a nail-biter finish of a match, MIBR continue their lower bracket run and keep Masters Bangkok in sight.

segments.description: G2 are looking scary.

segments.title: KRÜ Esports stomps LOUD, will face MIBR next in lower bracket
segments.description: KRÜ Esports dismantled LOUD 2-0 in the Americas Kickoff lower bracket, securing a top-four finish in the debut tournament for Americas.

segments.title: MIBR leaps past Leviatán to reach Kickoff top four

segments.title: KRÜ stamps out NRG, ready for rematch against LOUD
segments.description: In a decisive 2-1 victory, KRÜ has eliminated NRG and will now face LOUD for a place in the top four.
